name: Advanced Arabic
description: This course is for students who have passed ARA311H/ARA312Y or those who demonstrate commensurate Arabic skills. By the end of this course, students enable to reach a high level of proficiency in formal Arabic. Everyday language in the Egyptian and Levantine accents will be provided occasionally as supplementary materials for students' information only. However, students' skills will be assessed using formal Arabic only, which is the focus of this course. [72L, 24T]
prerequisites: ARA312Y5/ARA311H5. Students who have not completed ARA312Y5/311H5, must obtain permission from the department before enrolling.
